<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get total project time"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/project/{id:[0-9]+}/time/total"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the total time spent on the project with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"description":"Project ID","type":"integer"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Project time","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
